"This is a good general-use spread for giving an overall picture of the resolution to a problem in the past or future. It affords an opportunity to examine inner and outer influences before an action is taken, the inception or motivation of the action, the progression of the action, the resolution, and what inner and outer effects this will have. It may also act to highlight the process by which a question uppermost in the querent's mind may be answered, though it may not give the answer." - Cortese
Inner influences at work, the motivations of the querent, or what the querent wishes to learn
Inner influences at work, the motivations of the querent, or what the querent wishes to learn
Inner influences at work, the motivations of the querent, or what the querent wishes to learn
Outer influences, or the influences from people or things outside of the querent that may have caused the querent to ask their question
Outer influences, or the influences from people or things outside of the querent that may have caused the querent to ask their question
Outer influences, or the influences from people or things outside of the querent that may have caused the querent to ask their question
Initiation of the action, the seed that will grow, or the question that will be answered
The initial stages of the actions
modifies card 9 'Beginnings 1'. It may give a hazy picture of the outcome that the querent has in mind, or it may simply be a further examination of the beginnings of the action under consideration.
The way that the outcome is achieved
modifies card 11 'Progress 1' in the same way card 10 does card 9.
Possible changes in plan, or resolution. This card may serve to examine any ways that the querent will have to change course in midstream.
modifies card 13 'Changes 1' in the same way card 10 does card 9.
Outcome of the process outlined in cards 9 - 14.
Possible effects of the resolution on the querent
Possible effects of the resolution on the querent
Possible effects of the resolution on the querent
Possible effects of the resolution on things other than the querent or on the querent's relationship to the world around him/her.
Possible effects of the resolution on things other than the querent or on the querent's relationship to the world around him/her.
Possible effects of the resolution on things other than the querent or on the querent's relationship to the world around him/her.
